securitize.translation[0].definitions[0]: if a financial institution securitizes loans, it buys the loans from lenders such as banks and uses them as BACKING for bonds. The financial institution uses the repayments on these loans to make payments to investors who buy the bonds. Money that the lenders get from the financial institution when it sells the bonds is used to improve its financial situation, make more loans to customers etc
The company purchases and securitizes mortgages from all over the United States.
